passage_text: detailed map of Vadakku Valliyur and near places. Welcome to the Vadakku Valliyur google satellite map! This place is situated in Tirunelveli Kattabomman, Tamil Nadu, India, its geographical coordinates are 8° 23' 0 North, 77° 39' 0 East and its original name (with diacritics) is Vadakku Valliyūr.

Valliyur or Vallioor is a panchayat union in Radhapuram taluk in Tirunelveli district in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. Valliyur is one of the fastest growing towns in Tirunelveli district. This town is located along NH 7. It gets its name from the goddess Valli, consort of Lord Murugan. Its in a place that connects two big towns as Tirunelveli and Nagercoil in NH 7.

Saravanapoikai Tank, Valliyur Subramaniyar Swāmi Kovil. This ancient Murugan temple is located at Valliyur, near Nanguneri, not far from Tirunelveli and Kanyakumari. Valliyoor is located on the Kashi-Kanyakumari highway, it is at 30 milestones from Tirunelveli and 60 kms from Tiruchendur. The Valliyoor Murugan temple is located in close proximity to the Valliyoor railway station.
